CHAT.comment: Looking at books , telling stories , and playing with building blocks.
This file is the first of a series of two (32a and 32b) for the same session.
Room next to the classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.

u.a: the first minute comes from the audio file (there is no corresponding video) .
Nina was bringing a chair in order to sit in front of the camera .
not wanting to share one of her books with Chloé .
lying the book on the table .
par = à cause du $LEX $SUB $PREP ; ai = suis $LEX $SUB $AUX ; $SYN $LOS $OBJ
pointing at books on the table .
